system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal
Effect: The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack. This attack is unaffected by the Abilities of other creatures.
Requirement: [Solgaleo] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Sunsteel Strike on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
